name: Mark Olsen Parsifal Corporation
overview:
Led by Mark Olsen, Parsifal Corporation is the nation’s leading relocation auditing, technology, and consulting firm. Aside from his role as the president, Mark Olsen also serves Parsifal Corporation as the chief executive officer. As a result of his policies, the company remains committed to ensuring reasonable rates along with high quality service.

Currently, the company maintains operations throughout several states, with offices in Florida, New York, Maine, Indiana, Colorado, and Alabama. In addition, the company offers services in more than 120 countries around the world, including countries in the Americas, Europe, Asia, Africa, and Australia.

Since its foundation in 1981, Parsifal Corporation has grown its services to include a wide range of clientele, including corporate, government, third party, and carrier. Demonstrating distinguished, quality service, the company has been the recipient of much praise, earning acclamations for its participation in two DOD programs, as well as a nomination by the Military Traffic Management Command for being the “small business contractor of the year.”

Utilizing only the top technology systems, the company recently made its MoveMetric Domestic System available to US clients for domestic household goods pricing and bidding, as well as transit time and service comparisons.
